description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police seeks to purchase office furniture.
full_summary:
### Call for Bids: Furniture Catergories 1, 2, and 5

#### Tender Information

* Reference Number: PW-23-01020223
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: 202301162/A
* Publication Date: January 10, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 14, 2023 at 14:00:00

#### Project Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking bids for the supply and installation of furniture categories 1, 2, and 5. The project includes the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to 4805 East Highway Street, Valleyview, Alberta by August 31, 2023.

#### Procurement Requirements

* The procurement is conditionally set aside for Indigenous businesses under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
* Suppliers must certify that they qualify as Indigenous businesses and comply with all PSIB requirements.
* The procurement is also set aside under the provision for set-asides for small and minority businesses, as per international trade agreements.
* A security requirement is associated with the requirement. Please consult the bid solicitation document for additional information.

#### Eligibility

* Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid.
* Non-Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) holders may submit a bid to the Identified User (IU) but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

#### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Sebastian Ptasinskas
* Procurement Specialist
* RCMP, Procurement and Contracting
* Email: [Sebastian.Ptasinskas@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:Sebastian.Ptasinskas@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 438-342-6447

#### Document Attachments

Please find the relevant documents and attachments at: [Canada Buy and Sell](https://buyandsell.gc.ca)
